verses.verse: אֵל־ <S%H410><s%> God נְקָמ֥וֹת <S%H5360><s%> to whom vengeance יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> belongeth O God נְקָמ֣וֹת <S%H5360><s%> to whom vengeance הוֹפִֽיַע׃ <S%H3313><s%> belongeth shew

הִ֭נָּשֵׂא <S%H5375><s%> Lift up שֹׁפֵ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> thyself thou judge הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth הָשֵׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> render גְּ֝מ֗וּל <S%H1576><s%> a reward עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto גֵּאִֽים׃ <S%H1343><s%> to the proud

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַ֖י <S%H4970><s%> How רְשָׁעִ֥ים ׀ <S%H7563><s%> how long shall the wicked יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָ֝תַ֗י <S%H4970><s%> How רְשָׁעִ֥ים <S%H7563><s%> how long shall the wicked יַעֲלֹֽזוּ׃ <S%H5937><s%> triumph

יַבִּ֣יעוּ <S%H5042><s%> [How long] shall they utter יְדַבְּר֣וּ <S%H1696><s%> [and] speak עָתָ֑ק <S%H6277><s%> arrogantly יִֽ֝תְאַמְּר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> boast כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> do אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> of iniquity
עַמְּךָ֣ <S%H5971><s%> thy people יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD יְדַכְּא֑וּ <S%H1792><s%> They break in pieces וְֽנַחֲלָתְךָ֥ <S%H5159><s%> thine heritage יְעַנּֽוּ׃ <S%H6031><s%> and afflict
אַ֭לְמָנָה <S%H490><s%> the widow וְגֵ֣ר <S%H1616><s%> and the stranger יַהֲרֹ֑גוּ <S%H2026><s%> They slay וִֽיתוֹמִ֣ים <S%H3490><s%> the fatherless יְרַצֵּֽחוּ׃ <S%H7523><s%> and murder

וַ֭יֹּ֣אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> Yet they say לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִרְאֶה־ <S%H7200><s%> shall not see יָּ֑הּ <S%H3050><s%> The LORD וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יָ֝בִ֗ין <S%H995><s%> regard אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> neither shall the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob

בִּ֭ינוּ <S%H995><s%> Understand בֹּעֲרִ֣ים <S%H1197><s%> ye brutish בָּעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> among the people וּ֝כְסִילִ֗ים <S%H3684><s%> and [ye] fools מָתַ֥י <S%H4970><s%> and when תַּשְׂכִּֽילוּ׃ <S%H7919><s%> when will ye be wise

הֲנֹ֣טַֽע <S%H5193><s%> He that planted אֹ֭זֶן <S%H241><s%> the ear הֲלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִשְׁמָ֑ע <S%H8085><s%> shall he not hear אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> that יֹ֥צֵֽר <S%H3335><s%> ? he that formed עַ֝֗יִן <S%H5869><s%> the eye הֲלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יַבִּֽיט׃ <S%H5027><s%> shall he not see

הֲיֹסֵ֣ר <S%H3256><s%> He that chastiseth גּ֭וֹיִם <S%H1471><s%> the heathen הֲלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יוֹכִ֑יחַ <S%H3198><s%> shall not he correct הַֽמְלַמֵּ֖ד <S%H3925><s%> ? he that teacheth אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> man דָּֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> knowledge

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD יֹ֭דֵעַ <S%H3045><s%> knoweth מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת <S%H4284><s%> the thoughts אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> of man כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they הָֽבֶל׃ <S%H1892><s%> that they [are] vanity

אַשְׁרֵ֤י ׀ <S%H835><s%> Blessed הַגֶּ֣בֶר <S%H1397><s%> [is] the man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom תְּיַסְּרֶ֣נּוּ <S%H3256><s%> whom thou chastenest יָּ֑הּ <S%H3050><s%> O LORD וּֽמִתּוֹרָתְךָ֥ <S%H8451><s%> him out of thy law תְלַמְּדֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H3925><s%> and teachest

לְהַשְׁקִ֣יט <S%H8252><s%> That thou mayest give him rest ל֭וֹ מִ֣ימֵי <S%H3117><s%> from the days רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> of adversity עַ֤ד <S%H5704><s%> Until יִכָּרֶ֖ה <S%H3738><s%> be digged לָרָשָׁ֣ע <S%H7563><s%> for the wicked שָֽׁחַת׃ <S%H7845><s%> until the pit

כִּ֤י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִטֹּ֣שׁ <S%H5203><s%> will not cast off יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people וְ֝נַחֲלָת֗וֹ <S%H5159><s%> his inheritance לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יַעֲזֹֽב׃ <S%H5800><s%> neither will he forsake כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against

צֶ֭דֶק <S%H6664><s%> unto righteousness יָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> shall return מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> But judgment וְ֝אַחֲרָ֗יו <S%H310><s%> shall follow כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׁרֵי־ <S%H3477><s%> and all the upright לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> in heart

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who יָק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> Who will rise up לִ֭י עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against מְרֵעִ֑ים <S%H7489><s%> for me against the evildoers מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who יִתְיַצֵּ֥ב <S%H3320><s%> ? [or] who will stand up לִ֝י עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> for me against the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> wickedness

לוּלֵ֣י <S%H3884><s%> Unless יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עֶזְרָ֣תָה <S%H5833><s%> [had been] my help לִּ֑י כִּמְעַ֓ט ׀ <S%H4592><s%> had almost שָֽׁכְנָ֖ה <S%H7931><s%> dwelt דוּמָ֣ה <S%H1745><s%> in silence נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> my soul

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אָ֭מַרְתִּי <S%H559><s%> When I said מָ֣טָה <S%H4131><s%> slippeth רַגְלִ֑י <S%H7272><s%> My foot חַסְדְּךָ֥ <S%H2617><s%> thy mercy יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD יִסְעָדֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5582><s%> held me up

בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> In the multitude שַׂרְעַפַּ֣י <S%H8312><s%> of my thoughts בְּקִרְבִּ֑י <S%H7130><s%> within תַּ֝נְחוּמֶ֗יךָ <S%H8575><s%> me thy comforts יְֽשַׁעַשְׁע֥וּ <S%H8173><s%> delight נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> my soul

הַֽ֭יְחָבְרְךָ <S%H2266><s%> have fellowship כִּסֵּ֣א <S%H3678><s%> Shall the throne הַוּ֑וֹת <S%H1942><s%> of iniquity יֹצֵ֖ר <S%H3335><s%> with thee which frameth עָמָ֣ל <S%H5999><s%> mischief עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> and חֹֽק׃ <S%H2706><s%> appointed

יָ֭גוֹדּוּ <S%H1413><s%> They gather themselves together עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> against the soul צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous וְדָ֖ם <S%H1818><s%> blood נָקִ֣י <S%H5355><s%> the innocent יַרְשִֽׁיעוּ׃ <S%H7561><s%> and condemn

וַיְהִ֬י <S%H1961><s%> has been יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> But the LORD לִ֣י לְמִשְׂגָּ֑ב <S%H4869><s%> is my defence וֵ֝אלֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> and my God לְצ֣וּר <S%H6697><s%> [is] the rock מַחְסִֽי׃ <S%H4268><s%> of my refuge

וַיָּ֤שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> And he shall bring עֲלֵיהֶ֨ם ׀ <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אוֹנָ֗ם <S%H205><s%> upon them their own iniquity וּבְרָעָתָ֥ם <S%H7451><s%> in their own wickedness יַצְמִיתֵ֑ם <S%H6789><s%> and shall cut them off יַ֝צְמִיתֵ֗ם <S%H6789><s%> shall cut them off יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [yea] the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> our God
